frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-pip-on-top
frozen.shortDescription: Makes "Picture-in-Picture" windows stay on top (even on Wayland session). Compatible with Firefox and Clapper media player.
frozen.longDescription: Makes "Picture-in-Picture" windows stay on top (even on Wayland session). Compatible with Firefox and Clapper media player.
